sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_trigger"><sys_trigger action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><application/><calendar/><claimed_by/><document/><document_key/><error_count>0</error_count><job_context>#Thu Sep 26 12:53:05 PDT 2019 fcScriptName=in the schedule record </job_context><job_id display_value="RunScriptJob">81c92ce9c0a8016400e5f0d2f784ea78</job_id><last_error/><log>false</log><maintenance>false</maintenance><max_drift/><name>TwitterSearchJob</name><next_action>2019-09-26 20:02:08</next_action><parent/><priority>100</priority><processing_duration>878</processing_duration><repeat>1970-01-01 01:00:00</repeat><replication_originator>edc69723db5f7f0052cec597059619ef</replication_originator><rollback_context_id/><run_count>1</run_count><run_dayofmonth/><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_month>1</run_month><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_weekinmonth>1</run_weekinmonth><script>var twitter = new TwitterSearchUtil(); twitter.execute();</script><state>0</state><sys_created_by>claudia.cruz</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-09-26 19:52:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c60d483dbc48c10ca1da0da4b9619d3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>claudia.cruz</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-26 19:55:40</sys_updated_on><system_id/><trigger_class>DEFAULT</trigger_class><trigger_type>1</trigger_type><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sys_trigger></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_666f3a62dbc00c10ca1da0da4b961910
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.TwitterSearchUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>TwitterSearchUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var TwitterSearchUtil = Class.create();
TwitterSearchUtil.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},

	execute: function(){
		var token = this.getAuthorizationBearer();
		var terms = this.getHashTags();
		for (var i = 0; i < terms.length; i++) {
			var term = terms[i];
			var client = this.getSearchResults(token, term);
			this.getResponseBody(client);
		}
	}, 

	getAuthorizationBearer: function() { 
		var client = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Get Twitter OAuth Token', 'post');
		var response = client.execute().getBody();
		var token = (new JSONParser()).parse(response).access_token;
		gs.log("token" + token);
		return 'Bearer ' + token;  
	},

	getSearchResults: function(token, query) {  
		var client = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Get Twitter Search', 'get');
		client.setStringParameter('token', token);
		client.setStringParameter('q', query);
		return client;
	},

	getResponseBody: function(client){
		var social_channel = this.getSocialChannel();
		var response = client.execute().getBody();
		var result = JSON.parse(response);
		result.statuses.forEach(function(key){
			var URL = 'https://www.twitter.com/status/' + key.id_str;
			var PROFILE_URL = 'https://www.twitter.com/'+  key.user.screen_name;
			var DATE = new GlideTime(Date.parse(key.created_at));
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_app_cs_social_social_log');
			if(!gr.get('external_id', key.id_str)){
				gr.initialize();
				gr.setValue('external_id', key.id_str);
				gr.setValue('message', key.text);	
				gr.setValue('social_url', URL);
				var grProfile =  new GlideRecord('sn_app_cs_social_social_profile');
				if(!grProfile.get('social_id', key.user.screen_name )){
					grProfile = new GlideRecord('sn_app_cs_social_social_profile');
					grProfile.initialize();
					grProfile.setValue('channel' , social_channel );
					grProfile.setValue('social_id', key.user.screen_name);
					grProfile.setValue(' profile_url', PROFILE_URL);
					grProfile.insert();
				}	
				var SOCIAL_PROFILE = grProfile.getUniqueValue();	
				gr.setValue('social_profile', SOCIAL_PROFILE);
				gr.insert();
			}
		});

	},

	getSocialChannel: function(){
		var grChannel = new GlideRecord('sn_app_cs_social_social_channel');
		grChannel.addQuery('name' , 'CONTAINS', 'Twitter');
		grChannel.query();
		grChannel.next();
		return grChannel.getUniqueValue();
	},


	getHashTags: function() {
		var terms = [],
		gr = new GlideRecord('u_twitter_hashtag');
		gr.query();
		while (gr.next()){
			terms.push(gr.getValue('u_hashtag'));
		}
		return terms;
	},

	type: 'TwitterSearchUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>claudia.cruz</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-09-25 19:20:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>666f3a62dbc00c10ca1da0da4b961910</sys_id><sys_mod_count>69</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TwitterSearchUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_666f3a62dbc00c10ca1da0da4b961910</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>claudia.cruz</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-26 19:28:25</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
